alert.note: Alert for Coconino Plateau; Eastern Mogollon Rim; Western Mogollon Rim; Yavapai County Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 28 at 2:17PM MST until December 28 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow. New snow accumulations generally ranging between 2 and 8 inches, with lesser amounts below 5000 feet and locally higher amounts above 7000 feet. Southwest winds gusting to near 40 mph at times, leading to areas of blowing snow. * WHERE...Areas near Doney Park, Flagstaff, Forest Lakes, Heber- Overgaard, Prescott, Prescott Valley, Seligman, Valle, and Williams. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Slippery and snow covered roads could lead to very difficult travel. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility at times. Hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. Additional snow forecast through 11 PM Tonight: Doney Park 2 to 4 inches. Flagstaff 6 to 8 inches. Forest Lakes 7 to 9 inches. Heber-Overgaard 2 to 4 inches. Prescott 2 to 4 inches. Prescott Valley 1 to 2 inches. Seligman around 1 inch. Valle 2 to 4 inches. Williams 6 to 8 inches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Coconino Plateau; Eastern Mogollon Rim; Western Mogollon Rim; Yavapai County Mountains
